title: Worth the Trouble
description: Video game programmer Marcellus Graham is in love with his co-worker and best friend, Victor Lange. Unfortunately, he's pretty sure the feelings aren't mutual. Even if they were, he's got so many old scars he's not quite ready to take the relationship leap again.Until one night when Vic shows up drunk at Marcâ€™s doorstep and kisses him, only to pass out and remember nothing the next morning. The two of them are stubborn more often than not. But will the chance of finding lasting love be worth the trouble?
author: Jennah Scott
